project1.title: Statistical Data Analysis Web App
project1.desc: Perform A/B and correlation tests interactively with automatic normality detection and dynamic column selection.

project2.desc: A dashboard for exploring time-series data, performing predictive trend analysis, and generating visual insights interactively.

project3.title: Finance Analytics Tracker
